Question.Subject: New to Twitter, HELP?
Question.Content:
i just got a twitter and i have no idea how to use it. If i want to talk to someone, i have no idea how to do it, could someone please help.
Like, if i saw someone's tweet, and i press reply, will it send it to them or something? how to i get in touch with them? besides DM because some people dont have it
Question.ChosenAnswer:
if you hit "reply" or just type @username it will appear on their homepage.
For more information, visit:
http://news.cnet.com/newbies-guide-to-twitter/

Answer.Content:
if you hit "reply" or just type @username it will appear on their homepage.
For more information, visit:
http://news.cnet.com/newbies-guide-to-twitter/
